title: What determines exchange rate between countries

content.question: Under a flexible exchange-rate system, the exchange rate between two countries’ currencies is determined by the

choices.label: amount of gold reserves held by the central bank in each country
gross domestic product of the exporting country
demand for and supply of each country’s currency
amount of resources available to the importing country
real interest rate in the exporting country

content.answer: demand for and supply of each country’s currency
